GSD.description:
tty: vt: initialize unicode screen buffer

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 446f123aa6021e5f75a20789f05ff3f7ae51a42f. For more details please see the references link.
